name: Dabbling in Drama
description:
SYNOPSIS:

CHARM HAS JOINED THE HIGH SCHOOL DRAMA CLUB PURELY TO DESIGN CLOTHES THAT ACTORS CAN FLAUNT ONSTAGE. 

BUT AS THE CLUB'S NEXT PLAY APPROACHES, SHE FINDS HERSELF DABBLING IN THINGS SHE'S NEVER TRIED BEFORE — HUNTING DOWN GHOSTS, STEPPING INTO THE SPOTLIGHT, PERHAPS EVEN LANDING HERSELF A BOYFRIEND?!

FEATURES:

  • ASA'S ROUTE (JUN'S ROUTE TO BE DEVELOPED, SUBJECT TO DEMAND)
  • MUSIC BOX WITH 10 ORIGINAL TRACKS
  • 20,000+ WORDS
  • 4 ENDINGS

CHARACTERS:

CHARM

SOPHOMORE FILIPINO TRANSFER STUDENT. SHE MAY BE THE CLUB'S NEWEST MEMBER, BUT HER COSTUME CONCEPTS LIGHT UP THE STAGE.

ASA

JUNIOR STUDENT AND ASPIRING BROADWAY ACTOR. AS THE RESIDENT HEARTTHROB, EVERY PLAY IN WHICH HE STARS DRAWS A HUGE CROWD.

JUN

SENIOR STUDENT RUNNING FOR VALEDICTORIAN. HE WEARS MANY HATS — CLUB PRESIDENT, SCRIPTWRITER, DIRECTOR, AND SUPPORTING ACTOR.

KIRA

SOPHOMORE STUDENT AND VARSITY VOLLEYBALL PLAYER. SHE EXPLORES HER ARTISTIC SIDE BY DESIGNING SETS AND MAKING PROPS.

REI

JUNIOR STUDENT AND HEIRESS OF THE CITY'S WEALTHIEST FAMILY. SHE OFTEN PERFORMS AS THE LEAD ACTRESS OPPOSITE ASA.

CREDITS:

  • WRITING: ilyilaice

  2. WOULD YOU PLAY A VN FOCUSING ON KIRA AND REI?
  3. ANY SUGGESTIONS FOR UPDATES?

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR PLAYING!
